alert.note: Alert for Ballard (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 8:43PM EDT until March 14 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .The Ohio River will continue to fall, dropping below flood stage at Olmsted and Cairo over the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 36.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 22.0 feet Thursday, March 23. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
